column1: Little Goat Diner////I had been here for breakfast which is definitely good
column2: but this was my first visit for dinner. Â Our server was very nice and knowledgeable about the menu
column3: though getting a refill on water or our drinks delivered took waaaay too long. Unfortunately my dinner choice
column4: which was recommended by our waitress
column5: was bad. The veggie burger was mushy
column6: not very tasty and really below average. We did have the hot crab dip with ritz crackers to start and it was decent
column7: but next time I'll be sticking with the breakfast food.
